translation.ja: NETFLIX オリジナルシリーズ

translation.en: Jurassic One, Jurassic One, come in.
translation.ja: ジュラシック･ワン

translation.en: This is Isla Nublar Base, over.
translation.ja: こちらは イスラ･ヌブラル基地(きち)

translation.en: - Go, Jurassic One. - Emergency. Hostiles in pursuit.
translation.ja: どうした？ 大変(たいへん)だ　肉食(にくしょく)が現(あらわ)れた

translation.en: Two friendlies in need of immediate extraction.
translation.ja: スタッフを脱出(だっしゅつ)させろ

translation.en: - Roger that, Base! On our way. -
translation.ja: 了解(りょうかい)　すぐ向(む)かう

translation.en: We can't stop here. Follow me!
translation.ja: 止(と)まるな　私(わたし)に続(つづ)け

translation.en: Wait. Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
translation.ja: 待(ま)て　動(うご)くな

translation.en: Stop, stop, stop, stop.
translation.ja: 止(と)まるんだ

translation.en: I think we lost 'em. - We gotta get to the chopper. -
translation.ja: うまくまいた ヘリに向(む)かおう

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: こっちだ

translation.en: Raptor bones?
translation.ja: ラプトルの骨(ほね)か

translation.en: Hurry! We're almost to the extraction point!
translation.ja: 急(いそ)げ　じき脱出(だっしゅつ)ポイントだ

translation.en: No! We can use the river to mask our scent and--
translation.ja: 待(ま)って　川(かわ)で体臭(たいしゅう)を…

translation.en: - Aw, crud! -
translation.ja: やばい “ゲームオーバー”

translation.en: Dang it!
translation.ja: ちくしょう

translation.en: Not cool, Brand.
translation.ja: ブランドン

translation.en: Yeah, like you know what cool is.
translation.ja: ビビってやんの

translation.en: - - Get off me, Brand! - -
translation.ja: やめてよ

translation.en: Aw, come on, man. The dinos get you and that old dude every time.
translation.ja: おいおい　あのオッサン また食(く)われてるぜ

translation.en: His name is Dr. Meriwether.
translation.ja: メリウェザー博士(はかせ)だよ

translation.en: His name oughta be Dinner.
translation.ja: “エサ”に改名(かいめい)しろ

translation.en: Brand, I'm so close. If I can just get around the T. rex, I'd beat the game and win the--
translation.ja: 兄(にい)ちゃん　あと一歩(いっぽ)なんだ これをクリアすれば…

translation.en: Trip to Jurassic World. I- I know. You've said it, like, a thousand times.
translation.ja: ジュラシック･ワールドに 招待(しょうたい)されるんだろ

translation.en: But if straight- up gamers say this thing's unwinnable, how's some dino- nerd kid gonna beat it?
translation.ja: こんな無理(むり)ゲーは 恐竜(きょうりゅう)オタクにはムリだ

translation.en: Great pep talk, bro. You been working on that?
translation.ja: 説得(せっとく)してもムダ

translation.en: Look, Darius, I know getting to Jurassic World
translation.ja: ダリウス　いくら父(とう)さんとの 夢(ゆめ)だからって―

translation.en: was your and Dad's dream, but there's more to life than just dinosaurs.
translation.ja: ダリウス　いくら父(とう)さんとの 夢(ゆめ)だからって― 恐竜(きょうりゅう)ばかり追(お)いかけるな

translation.en: You never leave your room anymore, bruh. Dad wouldn't want this.
translation.ja: 引(ひ)きこもってたら 父(とう)さんも悲(かな)しむ

translation.en: I hear you, but even if winning is dumb and hopeless,
translation.ja: そうだね でも 望(のぞ)みがなくても あきらめないよ

translation.en: I still gotta try, you know?
translation.ja: でも 望(のぞ)みがなくても あきらめないよ

translation.en: I guess so, D.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Can you at least, like, take a break? Maybe work in a shower? - 'Cause you're smelling pretty funky, man. -
translation.ja: せめてシャワーを浴(あ)びろ だいぶ ニオうぞ

translation.en: All right, look, you do you, D. Just do it quietly.
translation.ja: やるなら静(しず)かにな

translation.en: I don't want Mom on my case again for you staying up...
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)が母(かあ)さんに怒(おこ)られる

translation.en: That's it!
translation.ja: これだ

translation.en: - - Ah, attack patterns? No.
translation.ja: 攻撃(こうげき)パターン？　違(ちが)う

translation.en: Vocalizations, pack behavior? No.
translation.ja: 発声(はっせい)でも集団行動(しゅうだんこうどう)でもない

translation.en: Got it!
translation.ja: よし！

translation.en: So, if my theory's correct...
translation.ja: この仮説(かせつ)なら いける

translation.en: It's go time.
translation.ja: やってやる

translation.en: It's gotta be here somewhere.
translation.ja: アレはどこだ

translation.en: Where are you? Where are you? Where are you?
translation.ja: どこにあるんだ？

translation.en: There it is!
translation.ja: あった
“オプション”

translation.en: - - Please whistle.
translation.ja: “使(つか)う” さあ 吹(ふ)け

translation.en: Congratulations, player.
translation.ja: おめでとう！

translation.en: I'm Mr. DNA, and you're the first person to ever beat our game,
translation.ja: 私(わたし)はミスターＤＮＡ 史上初(しじょうはつ)のゲームクリアを祝(しゅく)し

translation.en: so we wanna reward you with a trip
translation.ja: いい場所(ばしょ)へ招待(しょうたい)しよう

translation.en: to Jurassic World's brand- new, state- of- the- art adventure camp.
translation.ja: ジュラシック･ワールドの 最新型(さいしんがた)キャンプだ

translation.en: That's right, get ready to join us at Camp Cretaceous!
translation.ja: そうとも　サバイバル･ キャンプで君(きみ)を待(ま)ってるよ

translation.en: Brand...
translation.ja: ブランドン

translation.en: Mom!
translation.ja: 母(かあ)さん！

translation.en: Welcome to Isla Nublar, campers.
translation.ja: イスラ･ヌブラルにようこそ

translation.en: You are the chosen few, the first kids in the entire world
translation.ja: 君(きみ)たちは 世界(せかい)で 最(もっと)も恵(めぐ)まれた子供(こども)だ

translation.en: to ever experience the awesomeness
translation.ja: 初(はじ)めて ここを体験(たいけん)できる

translation.en: that is Camp Cretaceous.
translation.ja: サバイバル･キャンプをね

translation.en: I know, the trip from the mainland was rough on some. Hello, Ben.
translation.ja: 本土(ほんど)からの旅(たび)は応(こた)えたろう なあ ベン？

translation.en: But you made it!
translation.ja: だが よくぞ来(き)た

translation.en: I'm Dave, head counselor. You heard that correctly-- head honcho, big shot.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)はデイヴ　何(なに)を隠(かく)そう お偉(えら)いヘッドカウンセラーだ

translation.en: Ah, so sorry I'm late.
translation.ja: 遅(おく)れてゴメン

translation.en: Welcome, campers! I'm Roxie, head counselor of Camp Cretaceous.
translation.ja: 私(わたし)はロキシー ヘッドカウンセラーよ

translation.en: Well, it's sort of a co- head counselor sort of situation.
translation.ja: 正確(せいかく)には 共同(きょうどう)ヘッドカウンセラーだ

translation.en: - Is it? -
translation.ja: そうだっけ？

translation.en: Anyway, some of you won contests to be here,
translation.ja: コンテスト勝者(しょうしゃ)もいれば ＶＩＰもいるが

translation.en: some of you had VIP invites, but for the next two weeks,
translation.ja: コンテスト勝者(しょうしゃ)もいれば ＶＩＰもいるが この２週間(しゅうかん)は みんなが ５つ星(ぼし)の待遇(たいぐう)を受(う)ける

translation.en: all of you will be getting the five- star treatment!
translation.ja: この２週間(しゅうかん)は みんなが ５つ星(ぼし)の待遇(たいぐう)を受(う)ける

translation.en: As our first campers, we've lined up exclusive behind- the- scenes tours of Jurassic World.
translation.ja: 初(はじ)めてだから 特別(とくべつ)に パークの舞台裏(ぶたいうら)も見(み)せるわ

translation.en: - Ooh! - Yes!
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: As well as kayaking, rock climbing, obstacle courses, and of course...
translation.ja: カヤック　クライミング 障害物(しょうがいぶつ)コース　そして…

translation.en: Dinosaurs?
translation.ja: 恐竜(きょうりゅう)！

translation.en: Yes... Darius, plenty of dinosaurs.
translation.ja: そうよ　ダリウス 恐竜(きょうりゅう)もたくさんいる

translation.en: So, ready for an adventure?
translation.ja: 冒険(ぼうけん)できるわよ

translation.en: Absolutely!
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that speech a little shorter, and really try to lean into the majesty of this place.
translation.ja: 今(いま)のスピーチ もっと短(みじか)く 感動的(かんどうてき)にできる？

translation.en: Okay, we're going now. Let's get the six of you to camp.
translation.ja: では 行(い)こうか ６人(にん)ともキャンプ地(ち)へ

translation.en: Uh, there are five of us.
translation.ja: ５人(にん)だよ

translation.en: Wait.
translation.ja: 何(なん)だって？

translation.en: Dino- kid, Track- Star, Internet Girl, Barfy, Texas.
translation.ja: 恐竜(きょうりゅう) アスリート セレブ 船酔(ふなよ)い テキサス…

translation.en: He's right. Where's Six?
translation.ja: ホントだ　６人目(にんめ)は？

translation.en: Greetings, my dudes. Kenji is here, so let the party commence!
translation.ja: ケンジ様(さま)のお出(で)ましだ 宴(うたげ)を始(はじ)めよ！

translation.en: - - Put this in my room.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)の部屋(へや)へ

translation.en: So, what's your deal?
translation.ja: で お前(まえ)は？

translation.en: Okay, let's go.
translation.ja: 行(い)きましょ

translation.en: I hope you got my mom's note.
translation.ja: ママがくれたメモ 見(み)た？

translation.en: I don't do well on windy roads.
translation.ja: 山道(やまみち)はニガテなんだ

translation.en: What's good, Brooklanders?
translation.ja: ブルックランダーズ

translation.en: It's your girl Brooklynn coming at you from the best place ever: Camp Cretaceous.
translation.ja: ブルックリンが今(いま)いるのは なんとサバイバル･キャンプ

translation.en: Like and subscribe to join me as I unbox Jurassic World!
translation.ja: パークを丸裸(まるはだか)にするから “いいね”と登録(とうろく)をヨロシクね

translation.en: Okay, I need you all to say who you are and a little bit about yourself.
translation.ja: みんなも自己紹介(じこしょうかい)して

translation.en: And, action!
translation.ja: アクション！

translation.en: I beat this awesome VR dinosaur game.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はＶＲゲームを クリアしたダリウス…

translation.en: - I'm Darius, by the-- - I'm sorry.
translation.ja: 僕(ぼく)はＶＲゲームを クリアしたダリウス… ちょっとマジ？ まさか あのブルックリン？

translation.en: I just can't believe... you're Brooklynn!
translation.ja: ちょっとマジ？ まさか あのブルックリン？

translation.en: I'm Sammy Gutierrez, total Brooklander!
translation.ja: 私(わたし)はサミー ブルックランダーよ

translation.en: Oh, also, my family supplies all the beef for the park, and that's how I got here.
translation.ja: 親(おや)が ここにビーフを 提供(ていきょう)してる

translation.en: Great to meet you, Sammy.
translation.ja: よろしく サミー

translation.en: Um... What's a Brooklander?
translation.ja: ブルックランダーって？

translation.en: Oh, that's just what my online followers call themselves.
translation.ja: フォロワーたちが作(つく)った愛称(あいしょう)

translation.en: Uh, all 27 million of us.
translation.ja: 2700万人(まんにん)もいるんだよ

translation.en: Yep. That's why she's the only one who gets to keep her cell phone.
translation.ja: だから 彼女(かのじょ)だけ スマホを使(つか)える

translation.en: She's famous.
translation.ja: 有名人(ゆうめいじん)はお得(とく)ね

translation.en: Hold on. Rich and famous?
translation.ja: マジかよ　リッチな有名人(ゆうめいじん)？

translation.en: Oh, meant to be.
translation.ja: こりゃ 運命(うんめい)だな

translation.en: - - Um, Dave, what's going on?
translation.ja: デイヴ　どうしたの

translation.en: - Nothing you need to worry about. -
translation.ja: どうってことないさ

translation.en: But you should all definitely stay in your seats.
translation.ja: 席(せき)を離(はな)れるなよ

translation.en: Guys?
translation.ja: みんな

translation.en: Guys?
translation.ja: おーい

translation.en: Crisis averted.
translation.ja: これでよし

translation.en: Oh, these things are always getting out of their enclosure.
translation.ja: この子(こ)たち すぐ逃(に)げるの

translation.en: A real live Compsognathus!
translation.ja: 本物(ほんもの)のコンプソグナトゥス！

translation.en: Oh, please. It took a blanket and a cat carrier to catch it.
translation.ja: おいおい 毛布(もうふ)と猫(ねこ)ケースで捕獲(ほかく)かよ

translation.en: Boring.
translation.ja: 拍子抜(ひょうしぬ)けだ

translation.en: - Scared you pretty good. -
translation.ja: 驚(おどろ)いたくせに

translation.en: Wow.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: Welcome to Camp Cretaceous.
translation.ja: ようこそ サバイバル･キャンプへ

translation.en: Oh, my gosh!
translation.ja: 本物(ほんもの)だ

translation.en: Hey, Brooklanders, check this place out!
translation.ja: ブルックランダーズ これ 見(み)てよ

translation.en: Is this not the most amazing place you have ever seen?
translation.ja: こんなにイケてる場所(ばしょ) 他(ほか)にある？

translation.en: If you think this is cool, you should see my dad's penthouse in the main park.
translation.ja: メインパークの オヤジの別荘(べっそう)があるぜ

translation.en: Yasmina! Hey, girl.
translation.ja: ヤスミナ　元気(げんき)してる？

translation.en: So, as an elite athlete, how pumped are you for camp?
translation.ja: ヤスミナ　元気(げんき)してる？ やっぱりアスリートは キャンプが好(す)き？

translation.en: Not a huge fan of being on camera.
translation.ja: カメラはニガテなの

translation.en: Or people.
translation.ja: ていうか 人(ひと)も

translation.en: This place is almost as big as my family's ranch back home.
translation.ja: うちの牧場(ぼくじょう)に 負(ま)けないくらい広(ひろ)い

translation.en: That's because when we're up and running,
translation.ja: フル稼働(かどう)したら―

translation.en: the camp will house 500 kids and 150 staff.
translation.ja: 子供(こども)500人 スタッフ150人が 寝泊(ねと)まりする

translation.en: Listen up!
translation.ja: 集(あつ)まれ

translation.en: Announcement time from your co- head counselors.
translation.ja: 共同(きょうどう)ヘッドカウンセラーが お話(はな)しする

translation.en: Psst, still not a thing.
translation.ja: しつこいわよ

translation.en: Okay, everyone, there's some ground rules to cover.
translation.ja: では ルールを言(い)うわ

translation.en: Curfew's at 8:00 p.m., and lights out at 9:00 p.m. sharp.
translation.ja: 門限(もんげん)８時(じ)　消灯(しょうとう)９時(じ) これは守(まも)ること

translation.en: - What? - Lame.
translation.ja: つまんない

translation.en: Fine.
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: This is for your safety. We are in a dinosaur- filled jungle.
translation.ja: 安全(あんぜん)のためよ ここは恐竜(きょうりゅう)のジャングル

translation.en: You must always keep your distance, or you could be seriously hurt, if not worse.
translation.ja: 気(き)をつけてないと 大(おお)ケガするか 最悪(さいあく)の場合(ばあい)…

translation.en: Define worse.
translation.ja: 最悪(さいあく)って？

translation.en: Cabins are up that- a- way.
translation.ja: さあ 客室(きゃくしつ)は上(うえ)だ

translation.en: - First one there gets top bunk! -
translation.ja: ベッドは早(はや)い者勝(ものが)ち

translation.en: - - Get this lovely lady back to her pen. Her family's probably worried sick.
translation.ja: 親(おや)が心配(しんぱい)するから オリに戻(もど)してあげて

translation.en: - - W- Wait!
translation.ja: 待(ま)ってよ

translation.en: Oh, man, I really wanted to get a closer look at that Compy.
translation.ja: もっと コンピーを 見(み)たかったのに

translation.en: I like your enthusiasm, Darius, but right now it's claiming a bunk time.
translation.ja: 熱心(ねっしん)なのはいいが 今(いま)は部屋(へや)に行(い)け

translation.en: So, you know... go claim a bunk.
translation.ja: ベッドを決(き)めてこい

translation.en: But it's the first dinosaur I've ever seen in person
translation.ja: でも 最初(さいしょ)の恐竜(きょうりゅう)だ

translation.en: and, I mean, we're here to see dinosaurs, so...
translation.ja: ここでは ありったけの 恐竜(きょうりゅう)を見(み)たい

translation.en: Oh, the day is not over, buddy.
translation.ja: まだ序(じょ)の口(くち)だぞ 少年(しょうねん)

translation.en: - Wow! -
translation.ja: すっげえ

translation.en: Dinosaurs!
translation.ja: 恐竜(きょうりゅう)だ

translation.en: There's Brachiosaurus.
translation.ja: ブラキオサウルス

translation.en: Parasaurolophus. Stegosaurus.
translation.ja: パラサウロロフス ステゴサウルス

translation.en: Ankylosaurus!
translation.ja: アンキロサウルスも

translation.en: Wow, you really do know your stuff, dino- nerd.
translation.ja: 詳(くわ)しいのね　恐竜(きょうりゅう)オタクさん

translation.en: Check out the... Brontosaurus.
translation.ja: あれは… ブロントサウルス

translation.en: They don't have those here. Common mistake.
translation.ja: 残念(ざんねん)　いないよ

translation.en: Are those Sinoceratops? When did you get those?
translation.ja: シノケラトプスだ いつの間(ま)に？

translation.en: They are cooking up all kinds of new dinos in that lab.
translation.ja: 日々(ひび) 新種(しんしゅ)を創(つく)ってる

translation.en: Whoa! Where are they herding 'em to?
translation.ja: どこに連(つ)れていくの？

translation.en: They're herding them back to their nighttime enclosures.
translation.ja: 夜間(やかん)の休憩場所(きゅうけいばしょ)よ

translation.en: Enough banter. It's zip- line party time!
translation.ja: お話(はなし)はそこまで さあ ジップラインだ

translation.en: Me? Maybe Yasmina should go first, or... Darius? Uh... Or anyone! I really don't--
translation.ja: なんで僕(ぼく)が１番(ばん)なのさ ヤスミナかダリウスに…

translation.en: Oh, hey there, dino- nerd. Whatcha doing?
translation.ja: 恐竜(きょうりゅう)オタク　どうした？

translation.en: Huh? Uh, nothing!
translation.ja: 別(べつ)に何(なに)も

translation.en: I was just, uh, heading out 'cause... thirsty.
translation.ja: のどが渇(かわ)いたから ちょっと そこまで

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I... I meant, um... hungry.
translation.ja: 実(じつ)は… おなかも空(す)いてて

translation.en: Oh, heh, look at that. Thanks, Kenji.
translation.ja: ありがとう ケンジ

translation.en: Look, bro.
translation.ja: いいか キョーダイ

translation.en: I don't want you to be intimidated by me just because I'm rich,
translation.ja: リッチだからって怖(こわ)がるな

translation.en: my father owns a few condos on the island, and I'm rich.
translation.ja: 親(おや)がいくつも別荘(べっそう)を 持(も)ってるだけだ

translation.en: - Uh, I'm not intimidated by you. - Oh, good.
translation.ja: 怖(こわ)くなんかないよ なら よかった ダチ同士(どうし) 打(う)ち解(と)けようぜ

translation.en: I just want us to be friends, and friends tell each other stuff.
translation.ja: なら よかった ダチ同士(どうし) 打(う)ち解(と)けようぜ

translation.en: For instance, what they're doing out of bed after curfew.
translation.ja: さっそくだが 門限(もんげん)すぎに どこへ？

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.ja: 教(おし)えろって

translation.en: I think you best get your arm off me... friend.
translation.ja: 手(て)をどかしてくれよ　友達君(ともだちくん)

translation.en: Oh. Why don't you make me, friend?
translation.ja: どかしてみろよ　俺(おれ)のダチ

translation.en: So that's what toxic masculinity looks like.
translation.ja: ワルの道(みち)って こうして始(はじ)まるのね

translation.en: Uh, sorry we woke you. I--
translation.ja: 起(お)こしてゴメン

translation.en: He was sneaking out, but I set him straight.
translation.ja: 俺(おれ)がこいつを止(と)めたんだ

translation.en: Look, I try to look out for the younger kids. It's who I am.
translation.ja: 年上(としうえ)の役目(やくめ)を果(は)たしたまで

translation.en: You guys don't understand.
translation.ja: 分(わ)かってくれよ

translation.en: I've been waiting my whole life to get here, and I'm gonna make the most of it.
translation.ja: 夢(ゆめ)の島(しま)に来(き)たんだ １秒(びょう)もムダにできない

translation.en: Those lights must be coming from the Compy enclosure. I gotta check it out!
translation.ja: あの照明(しょうめい)はコンピーのオリだ 見(み)てみたい

translation.en: Sneaking out to see dinosaurs in the dead of night,
translation.ja: 夜中(よなか)に恐竜(きょうりゅう)のオリに行(い)くの？

translation.en: mad danger of getting caught,
translation.ja: バレたら怒(おこ)られる

translation.en: great mood lighting...
translation.ja: でも チャンスね

translation.en: I guess that means...
translation.ja: こうなったら―

translation.en: we're going rogue. Kapow!
translation.ja: みんなでワルになりましょ

translation.en: I think this is it. The truck definitely headed this direction.
translation.ja: ここだ　車(くるま)もこっちに来(き)てた

translation.en: Of course this is it. Why else would they have--
translation.ja: 当然(とうぜん)さ　他(ほか)にどんな…

translation.en: Shh!
translation.ja: シー！

translation.en: Hey, Brooklynn.
translation.ja: ブルックリン

translation.en: You can get a good shot from over here.
translation.ja: ここなら よく撮(と)れるぞ

translation.en: - Allow me. - No, thanks. I can--
translation.ja: 貸(か)せよ いいえ　自分(じぶん)でやる

translation.en: - Just--  - Hey!
translation.ja: いいえ　自分(じぶん)でやる

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: 離(はな)して

translation.en: Thanks, Kenji. Real smooth.
translation.ja: ありがとう　超(ちょう)サイアク

translation.en: Relax, I'll get it.
translation.ja: 怒(おこ)るな　取(と)ってやる

translation.en: - Wait! What are you-- - I got it, kid.
translation.ja: ダメだよ 心配(しんぱい)すんな

translation.en: See? Ha! Good as new.
translation.ja: ほらな　新品同様(しんぴんどうよう)だ

translation.en: Great. Now, just climb back up and gently hand it to me.
translation.ja: よかった ほら 戻(もど)ってきなさいよ

translation.en: Sure, sure, right after I get a sweet dino- pic for your followers.
translation.ja: まあ待(ま)てって 先(さき)に恐竜(きょうりゅう)を撮(と)ってからだ

translation.en: No need to thank me.
translation.ja: 感謝(かんしゃ)しろよ

translation.en: Um, guys...
translation.ja: まずい

translation.en: this isn't the Compy pen.
translation.ja: コンピーじゃない

translation.en: Quiet, junior! The grown- ups are talking.
translation.ja: うるさいぞ 年上(としうえ)に口出(くちだ)しするな

translation.en: Ah, your followers are gonna love this.
translation.ja: フォロワーが喜(よろこ)ぶぞ

translation.en: Here, Compy- Compy- Compy.
translation.ja: おいで コンピー

translation.en: This isn't the Compy pen!
translation.ja: コンピーじゃない！

translation.en: - Uh, what's he babbling on about? -
translation.ja: 何(なに)を騒(さわ)いでる

translation.en: What the...?
translation.ja: あれは？

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: 急(いそ)げ！

translation.en: D'ah! Open the gate! Open the gate!
translation.ja: 開(あ)けてくれ

translation.en: - - Oh, please! Let me out!
translation.ja: 頼(たの)む　出(だ)してくれ

translation.en: Oh, come on!
translation.ja: まだか

translation.en: Dude! Please tell me you have a plan.
translation.ja: 何(なに)か作戦(さくせん)でもあるのか

translation.en: Let's move! The steam should keep him busy.
translation.ja: 煙(けむり)に紛(まぎ)れて走(はし)るだけだ

translation.en: Oh, crud!
translation.ja: やばい
